author: EXM7777
text:
the biggest lie you've been told is that anyone can "make it"

you should already be grateful for just having the opportunity to think about escaping your circumstances...

the ability to chase goals, build a business, or pursue financial freedom isn't available to everyone

if you're in a position to even consider these possibilities, you're already privileged beyond what most of the world experiences

be grateful, be humble, recognize your luck in having options that billions don't
